Harzard Function
================
**Reference**: David G. Kleinbaum and Mitchel Klein: Survival Analysis A Self-Learning Text, 3rd.

Cox Harzard Fuction Form
----------------------------
A Cox harzard function $h(t)$ has the form:
$$
h(t, \mathbb{X}) = h_0(t)e^{\sum^p_i\beta_iX_i}
$$

After all information: $X_i$, $D_i$ and $Z_i$ are obtained, $h(t)$ can be computed.
